word_mean: 斜视，斜眼：病人不能克服的眼偏斜。其两眼视轴的相对位置和正常生理情况下所需的位置不同。各种类型的斜视都叫作tropias，其斜视的方向冠以相应的字首来表示，如旋转斜视(cyclotropia)、内斜视(esotropia)、外斜视(exotropia)、上斜视(hypertropia)和下斜视(hypotropia)

sentence.Network_en: Conclusions: The operation procedure is feasible in correcting vertical strabismus.
sentence.Network_cn: 结论: 上述手术方法对治疗垂直斜视是可行的.

sentence.Network_en: In disuse strabismus , disturbance of visual acuity was present before strabismus developed.
sentence.Network_cn: 弱视是引起视力障碍最多见的疾病.

sentence.Network_en: The control group was determined surgical extent by angle of strabismus correction.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果治疗组矫正良好者55例(90.16%),部分矫正6例(9.84%).

PerfectNetExp.abs: 能同时注视一目标，斜视手术恢复期而仅能用一眼注视，另一眼的视轴表现不同程度的偏斜，此现象称为斜视（strabismus）。斜视的偏斜程度，可由测量两眼轴间的夹角而得。一、分类斜视隐斜视内隐斜外隐斜上隐斜下隐斜旋转隐斜.
斜字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 斜线〖 diagonal;obliqueline〗 斜眼,斜眼儿〖 strabismus〗 斜阳〖 settingsun〗.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek strabismos, from strabizein 'to squint', from strabos 'squinting'

means.word_mean: 1. abnormal alignment of one or both eyes
